segments.source_content: ## Highlights

translations.zh-hant: ## 重點更新

segments.source_content: ### Sidebar item description

translations.zh-hant: ### 側邊欄項目描述

segments.source_content: In [#8236](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/8236), we made it possible to provide a new `description` attribute for docs sidebar items of type `link` and `category`.

translations.zh-hant: 在 [#8236](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/8236) 中，我們新增了為 `link` 和 `category` 類型的文檔側邊欄項目提供 `description` 屬性的功能。
@@untranslatable_placeholder_08021a08

segments.source_content: These descriptions will be used in category generated index pages.

translations.zh-hant: 這些描述將用於分類生成的索引頁面中。

segments.source_content: ![Show sidebar category generated index with custom descriptions](./img/sidebar-item-description.jpg)

translations.zh-hant: ![顯示帶有自訂描述的側邊欄分類生成索引](./img/sidebar-item-description.jpg)

segments.source_content: ### Theme Query String

translations.zh-hant: ### 主題查詢字串

segments.source_content: In [#8708](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/8708), we added the possibility to force Docusaurus to initialize itself in `light` or `dark` mode through a new `docusaurus-theme` query-string parameter.

translations.zh-hant: 在 [#8708](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/8708) 中，我們新增了透過新的 `docusaurus-theme` 查詢字串參數強制 Docusaurus 以 `light` 或 `dark` 模式初始化的功能。

segments.source_content: This is useful to ensure a consistent theme when embedding an existing Docusaurus page into an iframe or WebView.

translations.zh-hant: 這對於在 iframe 或 WebView 中嵌入現有 Docusaurus 頁面時確保主題一致性非常有用。

segments.source_content: <IframeWindow url="/docs/?docusaurus-theme=dark" />

segments.source_content: ### Remark plugin npm2yarn upgrade

translations.zh-hant: ### Remark 插件 npm2yarn 升級

segments.source_content: In [#8690](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/8690), we upgraded our Remark plugin [@docusaurus/remark-plugin-npm2yarn](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/tree/main/packages/docusaurus-remark-plugin-npm2yarn) with many conversion bug fixes, first-class support for pnpm, and the ability to register custom converters producing new tabs.

translations.zh-hant: 在 [#8690](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/8690) 中，我們升級了 Remark 插件 [@docusaurus/remark-plugin-npm2yarn](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/tree/main/packages/docusaurus-remark-plugin-npm2yarn)，修復了多個轉換錯誤，新增對 pnpm 的完整支援，並允許註冊自訂轉換器來產生新的標籤頁。

segments.source_content: ### gtag support for multiple tracking IDs

translations.zh-hant: ### 多個追蹤 ID 的 gtag 支援

segments.source_content: In [#8620](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/8620) we added support for the [@docusaurus/plugin-google-gtag](/docs/api/plugins/@docusaurus/plugin-google-gtag) plugin to declare multiple tracking IDs.

translations.zh-hant: 在 [#8620](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/8620) 中，我們為 [@docusaurus/plugin-google-gtag](/docs/api/plugins/@docusaurus/plugin-google-gtag) 插件新增了宣告多個追蹤 ID 的支援。
@@untranslatable_placeholder_b73a4a7a

segments.source_content:
:::warning[Google is sunsetting Universal Analytics]

**[Google will sunset its Universal Analytics](https://blog.google/products/marketingplatform/analytics/prepare-for-future-with-google-analytics-4/)** on **July 1, 2023**.

Docusaurus users should migrate to Google Analytics 4. Google **does not permit to migrate your existing Universal Analytics data** to your new Google Analytics 4 property.

To preserve the continuity of your analytics, we temporarily recommend that you report events to 2 tracking IDs at the same time: the old one (`UA-*`) and new one (`G-*`). Refer to the **[dedicated issue](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/issues/7221)** for details.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::warning[Google 即將停止 Universal Analytics 服務]

**[Google 將於 2023 年 7 月 1 日停止其 Universal Analytics 服務](https://blog.google/products/marketingplatform/analytics/prepare-for-future-with-google-analytics-4/)**。

Docusaurus 用戶應遷移至 Google Analytics 4。Google **不允許將現有的 Universal Analytics 數據遷移**到新的 Google Analytics 4 資源。

為了保持分析數據的連續性，我們暫時建議您同時向兩個追蹤 ID 報告事件：舊的 (`UA-*`) 和新的 (`G-*`)。詳情請參閱 **[專屬議題](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/issues/7221)**。

:::

segments.source_content: ### Developer Experience

translations.zh-hant: ### 開發者體驗

segments.source_content: In [#8736](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/8736), we improved how we render error messages and added initial support to render the full causal chain of an error (see [ES2022 Error Cause](https://h3manth.com/ES2022/#error-cause)).

translations.zh-hant: 在 [#8736](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/8736) 中，我們改進了錯誤訊息的呈現方式，並新增了呈現錯誤完整因果鏈的初步支援（參見 [ES2022 錯誤原因](https://h3manth.com/ES2022/#error-cause)）。

segments.source_content:
:::tip

To see it in action, click here: <ErrorBoundaryTestButton cause="Probably undefined is not a function 😄"/>

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::tip

點擊此處查看實際效果：<ErrorBoundaryTestButton cause="可能是 undefined 不是一個函數 😄"/>

:::

segments.source_content: In [#8735](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/8735) we also made navbar-related error messages clearer to help users understand what they did wrong.

translations.zh-hant: 在 [#8735](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/8735) 中，我們還使導航欄相關的錯誤訊息更加清晰，幫助用戶理解他們做錯了什麼。

segments.source_content: ![Docusaurus navbar error message screenshot](./img/navbar-error.jpg)

translations.zh-hant: ![Docusaurus 導航欄錯誤訊息截圖](./img/navbar-error.jpg)

segments.source_content: ### Translations

translations.zh-hant: ### 翻譯功能

segments.source_content: We made it possible to translate some new elements:

translations.zh-hant: 我們新增了對以下新元素的翻譯支援：

segments.source_content:
- [#8677](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/8677) introduces a new `process.env.DOCUSAURUS_CURRENT_LOCALE` (experimental) allowing you to localize your config file, including site title, tagline, announcement bar, baseUrl...
- [#8616](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/8616) allows to translate the navbar and footer logo alt text

translations.zh-hant:
- [#8677](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/8677) 引入新的 `process.env.DOCUSAURUS_CURRENT_LOCALE`（實驗性功能），允許您本地化配置文件，包括網站標題、標語、公告欄、baseUrl等...
- [#8616](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/8616) 允許翻譯導航欄和頁腳標誌的替代文字

segments.source_content: We added default theme translation support for multiple languages:

translations.zh-hant: 我們新增了多種語言的預設主題翻譯支援：

segments.source_content:
- 🇭🇺 [#8668](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/8668): Hungarian
- 🇳🇴 [#8631](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/8631): Norwegian (Bokmål)

translations.zh-hant:
- 🇭🇺 [#8668](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/8668): 匈牙利文
- 🇳🇴 [#8631](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/8631): 挪威文（博克馬爾語）

segments.source_content:
:::tip

Completing theme translations is an [ongoing effort](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/issues/3526) and an easy way to contribute to Docusaurus. We add new theme features regularly, for which we often [need new translations](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/issues/3526).

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::tip

完成主題翻譯是一項[持續進行的工作](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/issues/3526)，也是為Docusaurus貢獻的簡單方式。我們會定期新增主題功能，這些功能通常[需要新的翻譯](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/issues/3526)。

:::

segments.source_content: ## Other changes

translations.zh-hant: ## 其他變更

segments.source_content: Other notable changes include:

translations.zh-hant: 其他值得注意的變更包括：

segments.source_content:
- [#8674](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/8674): respect `prefers-reduced-motion: reduce` media query
- [#8712](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/8712): use a navbar item of type `docSidebar` in template
- [#8801](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/8801): allow tabs children to be falsy
- [#8757](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/8757): make search page react to external query-string changes
- [#8803](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/8803): fix code block buttons position in RTL
- [#8615](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/8615): fix color mode toggle when using dark navbar
- [#8699](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/8699): fix navbar dropdown tab focus bug

translations.zh-hant:
- [#8674](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/8674): 尊重 `prefers-reduced-motion: reduce` 媒體查詢
- [#8712](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/8712): 在模板中使用類型為 `docSidebar` 的導航欄項目
- [#8801](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/8801): 允許標籤頁的子項為假值
- [#8757](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/8757): 讓搜尋頁面能回應外部查詢字串的變更
- [#8803](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/8803): 修正RTL模式下程式碼區塊按鈕的位置
- [#8615](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/8615): 修正使用深色導航欄時的顏色模式切換
- [#8699](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/8699): 修正導航欄下拉選項的標籤焦點錯誤
